text:
Alas, the La Stanza in Rosemere has CLOSED and the building is for lease! I'm so disappointed; it was my favorite buffet in Quebec and I'll miss the friendly people who worked there.

Unless I find that the same staff moved to a new location, I'll have to settle for my second choice, the Casa Corfu in Montreal (another fabulous buffet).
toilette toujours tout sale kokerelle kafard partout dans la cuisine proprietaire bon rien,seulement serveuse tres polie.
